mimic.callback:
apply_map(
            c(MED   = 'med',   SURG  = 'surg', CMED = 'med',  CSURG  = 'surg',
              VSURG = 'surg',  NSURG = 'surg', NB   = 'other', NMED  = 'med',
              ORTHO = 'surg',  TRAUM = 'surg', OMED = 'med',   GU    = 'other',
              NBB   = 'other', TSURG = 'surg', GYN  = 'other', PSURG = 'surg',
              OBS   = 'other', ENT   = 'surg', DENT = 'surg',  PSYCH = 'other')
          )
